snippet.title: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution - LRG3 2024 GBA Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Take a new look at Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution! This “revolutionary” adventure features hair-whipping action, six magical dance transformations, numerous spells and items, and the new ability to rearrange the multilayered stages for maximum exploration, along with a 4-player Link Cable Battle Mode! Thank you so much to everyone who has been looking forward to the game - the GBA cartridge version is on its way to a handheld system near you! https://wayforward.com/games/shantae-advance-risky-revolution
